title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 6042 and S. 2692 into Law â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
July 30, 2018
On Monday, July 30, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 6042, which delays for one year the reduction of Federal medical assistance percentage for Medicaid personal visits furnished without an electronic visit verification system; andS. 2692, which designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4558 Broadway in New York, New York, as the Stanley Michels Post Office Building.
